body_html:
@girving I think you just say "jenkins, test this please" and it will trigger the tests.

So, should I work on offset for this first before we merge?

Also, for both of these operations should there be a value to indicate the diagonal that is created and extracted?
For example:
dim=0 => A[i, i, i, i, i, i]
dim=1 => A[i, j, i, j, i, j]
dim=2 => A[i, j, k, i, j, k]
etc.

body:
@girving I think you just say "jenkins, test this please" and it will trigger the tests.

So, should I work on offset for this first before we merge?  

Also, for both of these operations should there be a value to indicate the diagonal that is created and extracted?
For example:
dim=0 => A[i, i, i, i, i, i]
dim=1 => A[i, j, i, j, i, j]
dim=2 => A[i, j, k, i, j, k]
etc.
